title: GINGER AND CHILLI PRAWN NOODLES
directions: Peel and cut the shallots in half. Place a wok on a medium-high heat, add the oil and the shallots. Stir-fry for three minutes, or until just golden. Add the chilli and garlic, and stir-fry for one minute. Add the prawns and stir-fry for a further two minutes.
Add the noodles and spring greens to the wok and cook for two minutes, until tender. Pour in the soy source and add the ginger. Simmer for 30 seconds. Want some more? Sorry, thatâ€™s shallot (sorry).
